heading: Hello. We’re RED Weddings. The color of love, passion & old Hollywood
description: RED Weddings is a premium wedding cinematography, photography, music and entertainment service firm for today’s most discerning brides and groomsNot only is your wedding worthy of the highest level of artistic investment and uncompromised attention to detail, it is the perfect subject for itWe create and capture the magic of your celebration with the same artistic and technical standards once associated only with Oscar-winning filmsWe transform your day into a piece of history by continuously challenging and setting new standards for wedding cinematography, photography, music, and entertainment production

services.description: That turn your perfect day into a work of art that you can revisit over and over again
Perfectly shot with albums and photo packages to meet your needs
FAA approved Drone Photography & Video that promises to amaze the eye
The best professional Club DJ’s & Live Entertainment to keep your wedding bouncing
Photo, Video,Slow Motion Booths and more for every need
Display family interviews, proposal video and more, for all to see
